r.var.name: weight
Label: Weight (nb: weight for a household is the same as for all income units within the household)

r.var.name: weight.10000
Label: Weight (nb: weight for a household is the same as for all income units within the household) - divide this variable by 10000 to match weights in later years

r.var.name: hh.equiv
Label: Equivalising factor (modified OECD)

r.var.name: age
Label: Age of household reference person (continuous)

r.var.name: age.code.1
Label: Age of household reference person coded from 1-15 (1= 15 years; 15=75+)

r.var.name: age.code.2
Label: Age of household reference person coded from 1-29 (1= 15 years; 29=75+)

r.var.name: age.code.3
Label: Age of household reference person coded from 1-29 (1= 15 years; 30=80+)

r.var.name: persons
Label: Total number of persons

r.var.name: persons.15.over
Label: Number of members aged 15 years and over in the household

r.var.name: persons.under.15
Label: Number of dependent children aged under 15 years in the household

r.var.name: persons.15.64
Label: number of persons aged 15-64

r.var.name: persons.65.plus
Label: number of persons age 65+
